Name: Chitir Chicken
Review Text: Ordered for delivery:fried chicken box for 2 and fried tenders. We were pleasantly surprised. REALLY delicious, good quality white meat. Will return for sure!

Name: Chitir Chicken
Review Text: Chitir is a pretty decent Chicken oriented fast food place in the Mosveld shopping centre in Amsterdam North ... just steps away by road underpass from the NH Amsterdam Noord hotel. Good for a quick evening meal or lunch for a small amount of money.

Review Text: Nice food. Basic fast food menu choices. Good for a quick bite or a casual hang with friends. Tables could be cleaned more often though, a lot are still dirty from the costumers before. Toilets were clean. Would go again üëç

Review Text: They made it fresh for my partner, he loved it so much ! I ate the rest of his meal wayyy later so it was cold and even cold it was SUCCULENT ! Great choice of spices ! Thank you for the good food, and Halal !

Name: Chitir Chicken
Review Text: This place has the best chicken, it tastes amazing never had something this deliscous out many places for chicken this one is number1 on my list. The service is great and the interior looks amazing. The kitcken is open so you can see how clean they are.

Name: Chitir Chicken
Review Text: Been here with a group of 4 and we all ordered different meals and it was all delicious (not to mention; in a good temperature) and I would defenitely recommend this restaurant to all. Stuff are very friendly the place inside is very welcoming. We will surely come back and try of what more they can offer.
